name: Space Clash!
description:
Space Clash! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 players. It was made in 5 weeks for Greenlight Jam.

- Score destroying other players' ships, ramming them with your own!

- Try not to be hit, as getting destroyed loses you points.

- When the time runs out, the player with the highest score wins!

How to play:

Each player only uses 1 button and the commands are configurable in the "Controls" screen. 

* Press to perform a short dash

* Hold and release to dash farther

Know issues:

- The current build does not have music and SFX implemented.
